logs.message:
Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.openAi","config":{"modelId":"gpt-3.5-turbo","messages":{"values":[{"role":"user","content":"You are an energy efficiency expert. I need you to analyze my electricity usage data and create a WhatsApp message.

Current daily usage: {{ $json.currentUsage }} kWh
Last week's average: {{ $json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
Percentage increase: {{ $json.percentageIncrease }}%
Date: {{ $json.date }}

Since my usage is unusually high ({{ $json.percentageIncrease }}% above last week), please:
1. Identify 3-4 most likely causes for this spike
2. Provide 2-3 quick fixes I can implement today
3. Format as a concise WhatsApp message (under 300 characters)

Keep the tone helpful but urgent. Focus on actionable advice."}]},"resource":"chat","operation":"message"}}

Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.whatsApp","config":{"resource":"message","operation":"send","phoneNumberId":"={{ $vars.whatsapp_phone_number_id }}","recipientPhoneNumber":"={{ $vars.my_phone_number }}","textBody":"ðŸš¨ *High Electricity Usage Alert* ðŸš¨

ðŸ“Š *Today's Usage:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.todayUsage }} kWh
ðŸ“ˆ *Last Week Average:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
ðŸ“‹ *Increase:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.percentageIncrease }}%

ðŸ’¡ *Possible Causes & Quick Fixes:*
â€¢ Check if AC/heating is running longer than usual
â€¢ Look for appliances left on overnight
â€¢ Verify hot water heater isn't malfunctioning
â€¢ Check for phantom loads (devices in standby)
â€¢ Consider recent weather changes affecting HVAC

ðŸ”§ *Quick Actions:*
â€¢ Unplug unused electronics
â€¢ Adjust thermostat by 2-3 degrees
â€¢ Run dishwasher/laundry during off-peak hours
â€¢ Check for any unusual appliance behavior

ðŸ’° *Estimated Extra Cost:* ${{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.estimatedExtraCost }}"}}

nodes.purpose: Make a simple GET request to retrieve data from an API

configuration.notes: Retrieve daily electricity usage data from smart meter API to compare with previous week's usage for anomaly detection

nodes.purpose: Transform data structure using JavaScript

configuration.notes: Compare current electricity usage with last week's data and determine if usage is unusually high (>20% increase)

nodes.purpose: Send a message to an AI model and get response

configuration.notes: Analyze electricity usage data and generate WhatsApp message with insights about high usage, possible causes, and quick fixes

values.content:
You are an energy efficiency expert. I need you to analyze my electricity usage data and create a WhatsApp message.

Current daily usage: {{ $json.currentUsage }} kWh
Last week's average: {{ $json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
Percentage increase: {{ $json.percentageIncrease }}%
Date: {{ $json.date }}

Since my usage is unusually high ({{ $json.percentageIncrease }}% above last week), please:
1. Identify 3-4 most likely causes for this spike
2. Provide 2-3 quick fixes I can implement today
3. Format as a concise WhatsApp message (under 300 characters)

Keep the tone helpful but urgent. Focus on actionable advice.

nodes.purpose: Trigger workflow daily to pull electricity usage data

configuration.notes: Triggers the workflow daily to pull electricity usage data from smart meter API

nodes.purpose: Send WhatsApp message with usage alerts and recommendations

configuration.notes: Sends WhatsApp alert when electricity usage is unusually high with possible causes and quick fixes

parameters.textBody:
ðŸš¨ *High Electricity Usage Alert* ðŸš¨

ðŸ“Š *Today's Usage:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.todayUsage }} kWh
ðŸ“ˆ *Last Week Average:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.lastWeekAverage }} kWh
ðŸ“‹ *Increase:* {{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.percentageIncrease }}%

ðŸ’¡ *Possible Causes & Quick Fixes:*
â€¢ Check if AC/heating is running longer than usual
â€¢ Look for appliances left on overnight
â€¢ Verify hot water heater isn't malfunctioning
â€¢ Check for phantom loads (devices in standby)
â€¢ Consider recent weather changes affecting HVAC

ðŸ”§ *Quick Actions:*
â€¢ Unplug unused electronics
â€¢ Adjust thermostat by 2-3 degrees
â€¢ Run dishwasher/laundry during off-peak hours
â€¢ Check for any unusual appliance behavior

ðŸ’° *Estimated Extra Cost:* ${{ $('Compare Usage').item.json.estimatedExtraCost }}
